janadhipathi sirisena maha jana gangawak idiriye ohu lajja nathi ayek bawata pradarshanaya kale da,nathinam ee maha janaganga lajja nathi pirisak bawata path kaleda yanna hara jana mahimaya thula awasanayata ithuru wu deyak natha.ehidi ohu me dakwa lankawe deshapalanaya thula hin nul gemkarayan lesa handunagena siti sajith premadasa saha karu jayasuriya mahinda rajapakshata wada janasammathawadayata garu karana prajathanthrawadin menma,mahinda tharamata balalobhin nowana bawada ohu tharam ashilachara nowana bawada pahadili kaleya.
